translations.landing.node.hero.title: Flyto2 for Node.js
translations.landing.node.hero.subtitle: Powerful workflow automation for JavaScript and TypeScript projects.
translations.landing.node.hero.notifyDesc: Be the first to know when the npm package is published.
translations.landing.node.hero.notifySuccess: You're on the list! We'll email you when it's ready.
translations.landing.node.features.title: What's Coming
translations.landing.node.features.subtitle: Native Node.js automation with first-class TypeScript support
translations.landing.node.features.typescriptDesc: Full TypeScript support with complete type definitions. IntelliSense everywhere.
translations.landing.node.features.asyncAwaitDesc: Native async/await support. No callbacks, no promises hell.
translations.landing.node.features.lightweightDesc: Minimal dependencies. Fast installation, small bundle size.
translations.landing.node.features.modulesDesc: Same powerful modules as Python. String, array, data processing, and more.
translations.landing.node.features.browserDesc: Playwright integration for headless browser automation.
translations.landing.node.features.testedDesc: Same reliability as the Python version. Comprehensive test suite.
translations.landing.node.code.title: Clean API
translations.landing.node.code.subtitle: A preview of the simple, intuitive API
translations.landing.node.comparison.title: Why Flyto2 for Node.js?
translations.landing.node.comparison.subtitle: The same power, native to your JavaScript ecosystem
